attributes.additional_details: Will this government give the electorate of this nation a referendum on membership of the EU, considering the great contributions that are being asked of this country during this time of austerity and the fact that the EU accounts have not been signed off as audited for so many years, also considering the failure of several EU nations that use the Euro as their only currency to repay their debts, or even maintain their own economies without more of the UK taxpayers hard earned contributions?
